blocks.subtitle: Subtítulo descriptivo que acompaña al título principal

fields.name: draft
fields.label: Draft
fields.description: If this is checked the post will not be published

fields.name: metaTitle
fields.label: Meta Title
fields.description: Override the page title for SEO

fields.name: metaDescription
fields.label: Meta Description
fields.description: SEO meta description

fields.name: canonicalUrl
fields.label: Canonical URL
fields.description: Canonical URL for this page

defaultItem.title: Título Principal
defaultItem.subtitle: Subtítulo descriptivo que acompaña al título principal

fields.name: yShift
fields.label: Background Y Position (%)
fields.description: Vertical position of background image (0-100%)

fields.name: title
fields.label: Title
fields.description: Main title for both Hero Title and Landing Page variants

fields.name: subtitle
fields.label: Subtitle/Description
fields.description: Subtitle for Hero Title variant or description for Landing Page variant

fields.name: authorName
fields.label: Author Name
fields.description: Highlighted author name (e.g., Luis Cruz) - Landing Page only

fields.name: hiddenText
fields.label: Hidden Text (mobile)
fields.description: Text shown only on desktop before main text

fields.name: theme
fields.label: Tema (colores)
fields.description: Elige que tema de colores quieres forzar para este elemento. O usa el tema del elemento padre.

options.label: 'Claro' por defecto, `Oscuro` si el elemento padre es también `Oscuro`.

fields.name: title
fields.label: Título
fields.description: El texto del título.

fields.name: level
fields.label: Nivel de encabezado
fields.description: Selecciona el nivel del encabezado (h1 ... h6).

fields.name: text
fields.label: Texto
fields.description: Contenido del párrafo

fields.name: textAlign
fields.label: Alineación del texto
fields.description: Selecciona la alineación del texto

fields.name: proseSize
fields.label: Tamaño
fields.description: Selecciona el tamaño

fields.name: secondaryButton
fields.label: Secondary Button
fields.description: Optional secondary button like in about layout

fields.name: hiddenText
fields.label: Hidden Text (mobile)
fields.description: Text shown only on desktop before main text

defaultItem.title: Nuestros Servicios
defaultItem.subtitle: Descubre cómo podemos ayudarte con soluciones personalizadas y efectivas.
defaultItem.noResultsMessage: No se encontraron servicios que coincidan con tu búsqueda.

fields.name: title
fields.label: Section Title
fields.description: Main title for the services section

fields.name: subtitle
fields.label: Section Subtitle
fields.description: Subtitle or description for the services section

fields.name: searchEnabled
fields.label: Enable Search
fields.description: Allow users to search through services

fields.name: searchPlaceholder
fields.label: Search Placeholder
fields.description: Placeholder text for the search input

fields.name: noResultsMessage
fields.label: No Results Message
fields.description: Message shown when search returns no results

fields.name: link
fields.label: Service Link
fields.description: URL path to the service detail page (e.g., /services/derecho-penal)

fields.name: linkText
fields.label: Link Text
fields.description: Text for the 'more info' links on each service card

fields.name: image
fields.label: Service Image
fields.description: Optional image for the service card

fields.name: metaTitle
fields.label: Meta Title
fields.description: Override the page title for SEO

fields.name: metaDescription
fields.label: Meta Description
fields.description: SEO meta description

fields.name: canonicalUrl
fields.label: Canonical URL
fields.description: Canonical URL for this page

fields.name: headerBlocks
fields.label: Header Blocks
fields.description: Optional header components for the layout

fields.name: logo
fields.label: Logo Text
fields.description: Main logo text (e.g., CGC)

fields.name: logoSubtext
fields.label: Logo Subtext
fields.description: Subtext shown next to logo (e.g., Luis Cruz)

fields.name: isSticky
fields.label: Sticky Header
fields.description: Make header stick to top when scrolling

fields.name: childrenBlocks
fields.label: Main Content Blocks
fields.description: Main content area - must include exactly one children block
